snippet: Jimmie Johnson edged Brad Keselowski on the final restart, adding to his Nascar Sprint Cup points lead with two races left.
abstract: Nascar driver Jimmie Johnson wins AAA Texas 500 auto race at Texas Motor Speedway, adding to his Nascar Sprint Cup points lead with two races left.
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson edged Brad Keselowski on the final restart, adding to his Nascar Sprint Cup points lead with two races left.
